title: Phase G: Production Scaffold Restructure
description:
Major scaffold restructure to production-ready SaaS architecture.

TARGET STRUCTURE:
- apps/api: Cloud Run production API (Express/Fastify)
- apps/web: Firebase Hosting dashboard (React/Vite/Tailwind)
- packages/contracts: Shared types/interfaces
- packages/pipeline: Core prediction engine
- packages/operator: Multi-tenant auth layer
- packages/agent: AI agent tools (optional)
- packages/sdk-js: Public JavaScript SDK for customers
- infra/: Deployment configs (Cloud Run, Firebase, env)
- scripts/: Organized into ci/, dev/, ops/
- db/: SQL schema (unchanged)

SEPARATION GUARANTEE:
- .agentfs/ and .beads/ remain internal dev-only
- Product code never imports from internal tools
- SQL is source of truth; Firestore optional for UI state

OUTCOME: Clean multi-tenant SaaS with customer-facing API, dashboard, and SDK.
